Moo in this game?
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher EVO Archive (PS2): Miscellaneous Q & A: Moo in this game?
By Lao Tse on Sunday, June 18, 2006 - 10:46 pm:

I saw some promo cards up on ebay for MR:Evo and one of them has Moo's picture. Naturally this got my hopes up but I don't see him listed anywhere. Can anybody confirm whether or not he's in the game before I think of buying it?

By Ito Saith Webb on Monday, June 19, 2006 - 07:36 am:

Moo is in the game however Moo is so far not playable but you do fight the dragon at one point of the game.

By mwmj on Wednesday, August 9, 2006 - 05:55 pm:

as a slight spoiler you actually get to fight him twice. Where the second time is I won't say because its elsewhere on the site and i don't want to spoil the location if you want to get there on your own
